amendment.description: An amendment numbered 113 printed in Part A of House Report 119-199 to strike funding for HIV prevention educational activities in foreign countries.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike funding for HIV prevention educational activities in foreign countries.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 326 (Roll no. 206).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Greene (GA) amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 326 (Roll no. 206).
